Different providers, different priorities
narrative: How effectively are donors targeting the countries with the highest numbers of people in poverty and the least domestic public resources to address it? This chart allows you to select a provider of aid to see how it allocates aid across countries

title: Are domestic public resources able to meet the needs of the poorest people?
narrative: The proportion of people living in extreme poverty worldwide has more than halved since 2000, yet progress is varied across countries. Although domestic public resources are an important resource to drive efforts to end poverty, they remain scarce in many countries where poverty is high
